data.title: Jensen Ackles's Wife and Relationship History
data.meta_description: Who is Jensen Ackles dating? Many famous women have dated Supernatural actor Jensen Ackles, and this list will give you more details about these lucky ladies.
data.text:
Jensen Ackles and Danneel Harris, now known as Danneel Ackles, began dating in 2006. The couple met on the set of the movie Ten Inch Hero, in which they co-starred. Their relationship progressed and after being together for three years, they decided to tie the knot. In May 2010, they got married in a private, intimate ceremony in Dallas. They have successfully maintained their relationship for 15 years now, as of 2021, and have welcomed three children in their union.

Danneel Ackles, originally Danneel Harris, is a seasoned actress who gained prominence for her recurring role in One Tree Hill. Alongside her acting career, she has also been a model known for her work with companies such as Juicy Jeans. While she was already well-known before her marriage, her bond with Jensen Ackles further boosted her fame.

Much earlier in his career, in the year 2005, Jensen Ackles was rumored to be in a relationship with Tania Saulnier. Their paths crossed when Saulnier featured as a guest in the horror series, Supernatural in which Ackles was a lead. However, their relationship was never confirmed and thus remained speculative.

Tania Saulnier is a Canadian actress recognized for her role in the movie Slither, where she played Kylie Strutemyer. Along with Supernatural, these roles enabled her to establish a considerable presence in the acting industry.

Jensen Ackles was linked with Joanna Krupa in 2003. As a prominent actor, his social circles were said to have overlapped with Krupa's. They dated for a brief period before ending their relationship amicably.

Joanna Krupa is renowned as a Polish-American model and actress. She was a participant in the reality TV show, Dancing with the Stars and is known for her appearance in Real Housewives of Miami. Aside from her entertainment work, she is also a committed animal rights activist.

In 2001, Ackles and LeAnn Rimes were reportedly dating. They are said to have first met at the Academy of Country Music awards event. However, it was a short-lived relationship.

LeAnn Rimes is a celebrated singer, songwriter, and actress. She rose to fame at a young age with her country music career and is known for her hit songs such as "Blue" and "How Do I Live." Rimes has won numerous prestigious awards throughout her career, including two Grammys.

In the early part of his career, Jensen Ackles was rumored to be in a relationship with Jessica Simpson in 1998, although it was never officially confirmed. It was speculated that they met through their entertainment industry connections.

Jessica Simpson is a renowned American singer, actress, fashion designer, and author. She gained fame during the late 1990s and early 2000s with her pop music career and reality show Newlyweds: Nick and Jessica, based on her then-marriage with Nick Lachey. Jessica also launched a successful fashion line, The Jessica Simpson Collection, which reportedly became one of the most profitable celebrity fashion brands.
